The_DT circumstances_NNS under_IN which_WDT this_DT change_NN came_VBD about_RB are_VBP as_IN follows:12_JJ REPORT_NNP ON_NNP -THE_NNP there_EX was_VBD a_DT saving_VBG under_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN European_JJ diets_NNS ,_, the_DT prices_NNS paid_VBN for_IN several_JJ important_JJ articles_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN meat_NN and_CC milk_NN ,_, were_VBD not_RB such_JJ as_IN to_TO admit_VB of_IN the_DT best_JJS quality_NN being_VBG obtained_VBN ._.

19_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Charles_NNP has_VBZ submitted_VBN a_DT special_JJ report_NN on_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN training_NN females_NNS in_IN the_DT practice_NN of_IN midwifery_NN ._.
I_PRP shall_MD ,_, before_IN offering_VBG any_DT remarks_NNS on_IN this_DT report_NN ,_, recall_VB the_DT circum-_JJ stances_NNS of_IN the_DT movement_NN ab_RB initio_NN as_RB far_RB as_IN it_PRP concerns_VBZ the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, leaving_VBG the_DT discussion_NN of_IN what_WP has_VBZ been_VBN done_VBN in_IN the_DT same_JJ direction_NN in_IN mofussil_NN hospitals_NNS and_CC dispensaries_NNS to_TO the_DT general_JJ report_NN of_IN those_DT institutions_NNS ._.
In_IN July_NNP 1869_CD the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP inquired_VBD whether_IN the_DT system_NN of_IN training_VBG native_JJ women_NNS in_IN midwifery_NN ,_, which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN tried_VBN at_IN Bareilly_NNP in_IN the_DT North-Western_JJ Provinces_NNS ,_, might_MD not_RB be_VB attempted_VBN in_IN Bengal_NNP ._.
Dr._NNP Charles_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD requested_VBN to_TO report_VB on_IN the_DT subject_NN ,_, pointed_VBD out_RP that_IN large_JJ training_NN schools_NNS for_IN midwives_NNS had_VBD been_VBN established_VBN on_IN the_DT continent_NN of_IN Europe_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN a_DT similar_JJ scheme_NN for_IN Bengal_NNP would_MD entail_VB great_JJ expense_NN ,_, while_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB objectionable_JJ to_TO collect_VB together_RB in_IN a_DT large_JJ city_NN the_DT class_NN of_IN females_NNS who_WP would_MD be_VB found_VBN willing_JJ to_TO undergo_VB instruction_NN in_IN midwifery_NN ._.
As_IN an_DT experiment_NN he_PRP proposed_VBD that_IN twenty_NN females_NNS should_MD be_VB attached_VBN on_IN a_DT stipend_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
5_CD a_DT month_NN to_TO the_DT midwifery_NN wards_NNS of_IN the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP Hospital_NNP for_IN six_CD months_NNS ._.
In_IN order_NN to_TO instruct_NN and_CC train_NN these_DT he_PRP proposed_VBD that_IN a_DT scholarship_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
15_CD a_DT month_NN should_MD be_VB given_VBN to_TO the_DT best_JJS midwifery_NN student_NN of_IN the_DT 4th_CD year_NN ,_, that_IN a_DT Bengali_NNP woman_NN should_MD be_VB employed_VBN on_IN Rs_NNP ._.
15_CD a_DT month_NN with_IN free_JJ rations_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN three_CD pupils_NNS should_MD get_VB Rs_NNP ._.
5_CD each_DT for_IN services_NNS as_IN pupil_JJ teachers_NNS ._.
Dr._NNP Chevers_NNP ,_, in_IN forwarding_VBG this_DT report_NN ,_, objected_VBD to_TO young_JJ girls_NNS being_VBG attached_VBN to_TO the_DT school_NN ,_, and_CC proposed_VBD that_IN six_CD professional_JJ midwives_NNS of_IN 30_CD to_TO 35_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN should_MD be_VB attached_VBN to_TO the_DT midwifery_NN wards_NNS for_IN practical_JJ train-_JJ ing_NN in_IN the_DT capacity_NN of_IN nurses_NNS ._.
Mr._NNP Saunders_NNP supported_VBD the_DT proposal_NN to_TO employ_VB a_DT limited_JJ number_NN of_IN middle-aged_JJ women_NNS as_IN nurse-midwives_NNS ,_, and_CC this_DT view_NN was_VBD supported_VBN by_IN the_DT Inspec-_NNP tor-General_NN of_IN Hospitals_NNS and_CC adopted_VBN by_IN Government_NNP in_IN submitting_VBG the_DT case_NN for_IN the_DT orders_NNS of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD proposed_VBN to_TO attach_VB six_CD such_JJ persons_NNS on_IN a_DT stipend_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
6_CD a_DT month_NN to_TO the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP Hospital_NNP and_CC General_NNP Hospital_NNP respectively_RB ._.
This_DT proposal_NN was_VBD sanctioned_VBN (_( Financial_NNP Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.
2570_CD ,_, dated_VBD 19th_CD November_NNP 1869_CD )_) ,_, and_CC communi-_NN cated_VBN for_IN compliance_NN to_TO the_DT Principal_NNP of_IN the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP Hospital_NNP and_CC Surgeon_NNP of_IN the_DT General_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
The_DT latter_NN reported_VBD (_( 20th_CD April_NNP 1870_CD )_) that_IN the_DT midwifery_NN practice_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN was_VBD very_RB limited_JJ (_( 12_CD confinements_NNS per_IN annum_NN )_) and_CC did_VBD not_RB offer_VB sufficient_JJ opportunity_NN of_IN practical_JJ training_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Chevers_NNP represented_VBD (_( 29th_CD March_NNP )_) that_IN all_DT attempts_NNS to_TO induce_VB women_NNS to_TO come_VB to_TO the_DT hospital_NN had_VBD failed_VBN ._.
The_DT stipend_NN was_VBD also_RB said_VBD to_TO be_VB too_RB low_JJ to_TO act_VB as_IN a_DT sufficient_JJ inducement_NN ._.
Government_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT representation_NN of_IN this_DT office_NN ,_, agreed_VBD (_( 11th_CD May_NNP )_) to_TO limit_VB the_DT experiment_NN to_TO the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, and_CC sanctioned_VBD the_DT payment_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
9_CD per_IN mensem_NN to_TO eight_CD women_NNS ._.
These_DT orders_NNS were_VBD duly_RB communicated_VBN ._.
Dr._NNP Chevers_NNP reported_VBD (_( 10th_CD December_NNP 1870_CD )_) that_IN one_CD woman_NN had_VBD joined_VBN and_CC three_CD others_NNS were_VBD expected_VBN ._.
He_PRP solicited_VBD sanction_NN for_IN the_DT employment_NN of_IN a_DT Christian_JJ matron_NN on_IN Rs_NNP ._.
20_CD a_DT month_NN ,_, and_CC pressed_VBD the_DT adoption_NN of_IN the_DT arrangements_NNS originally_RB recommended_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Charles_NNP for_IN instructing_VBG the_DT women_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT erection_NN of_IN a_DT tiled_JJ hut_NN to_TO accommodate_VB them_PRP ._.
Dr._NNP Chevers_NNP was_VBD instructed_VBN that_IN he_PRP should_MD use_VB the_DT means_NNS at_IN his_PRP$ disposal_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT Inspector-General_NNP was_VBD not_RB disposed_VBN to_TO recommend_VB the_DT very_RB considerable_JJ additional_JJ expenditure_NN (_( Rs_NNP ._.
65_CD a_DT month_NN )_) it_PRP was_VBD proposed_VBN to_TO incur_VB for_IN the_DT instruction_NN of_IN a_DT few_JJ women_NNS ._.
A_DT special_JJ report_NN was_VBD called_VBN for_IN on_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN accommodation_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD finally_RB resolved_VBN (_( Bengal_JJ Government_NNP letter_NN No_NNP ._.
341_CD ,_, dated_VBD 28th_CD January_NNP 1871_CD ,_, )_) that_IN no_DT increased_JJ expenditure_NN could_MD be_VB permitted_VBN ,_, that_IN it_PRP appeared_VBD objec-_JJ tionable_JJ to_TO place_VB any_DT more_JJR buildings_NNS on_IN the_DT hospital_NN compound_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT plan_NN might_MD be_VB tried_VBN of_IN allowing_VBG the_DT women_NNS to_TO lodge_VB outside_IN the_DT College_NNP premises_NNS ,_, attending_VBG daily_JJ for_IN instruc-_JJ tion_NN ._.
These_DT arrangements_NNS were_VBD accordingly_RB carried_VBN out_RP ._.
In_IN May_NNP it_PRP was_VBD represented_VBN that_IN the_DT first_JJ woman_NN who_WP had_VBD come_VBN forward_RB for_IN instruction_NN had_VBD become_VBN a_DT prostitute_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN ,_, through_IN the_DT exertions_NNS of_IN Baboos_NNP Keshub_NNP Chunder_NNP Sen_NNP and_CC Nil_NNP Madub_NNP Mookerjee_NNP ,_, several_JJ young_JJ women_NNS had_VBD joined_VBN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Chevers_NNP again_RB pressed_VBD the_DT propriety_NN of_IN entertaining_VBG a_DT matron_NN to_TO look_VB after_IN the_DT females_NNS who_WP had_VBD joined_VBN ,_, now_RB amounting_VBG to_TO the_DT full_JJ complement_NN of_IN eight_CD ._.
Government_NNP (_( No_NNP ._.
2429_CD of_IN 1st_CD August_NNP 1871_CD )_) approved_VBD of_IN the_DT representation_NN of_IN this_DT office_NN that_IN it_PRP was_VBD a_DT mistake_NN to_TO entertain_VB young_JJ women_NNS ,_, that_IN the_DT number_NN should_MD be_VB limited_VBN to_TO six_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT two_CD remaining_VBG stipends_NNS absorbed_VBN in_IN obtaining_VBG the_DT services_NNS of_IN a_DT matron_NN ,_, who_WP should_MD look_VB after_IN the_DT women_NNS ,_, who_WP might_MD be_VB hutted_VBN or_CC lodged_VBN together_RB outside_IN the_DT hospital_NN premises_NNS ._.
Training_VBG females_NNS in_IN midwifery_NN ._.
D_NNP 14_CD REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP Dr._NNP Charles_NNP '_POS report_NN sets_NNS forth_VBP the_DT progress_NN of_IN the_DT experiment_NN up_RB to_TO the_DT close_NN of_IN 1871_CD ._.
Ten_CD women_NNS had_VBD been_VBN received_VBN for_IN training_NN :_: three_CD of_IN these_DT were_VBD removed_VBN for_IN immorality_NN ;_: one_CD for_IN disobedience_NN of_IN orders_NNS ;_: one_CD ceased_VBD attending_NN ;_: one_CD was_VBD withdrawn_VBN by_IN her_PRP$ friends_NNS ;_: one_CD pro-_NN mised_VBN well_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT remaining_VBG three_CD underwent_JJ a_DT satisfactory_JJ examination_NN on_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN natural_JJ labor_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Charles_NNP places_VBZ some_DT strong_JJ remarks_NNS on_IN record_NN regarding_VBG the_DT three_CD unfor-_JJ tunate_JJ women_NNS who_WP appear_VBP to_TO have_VB gone_VBN astray_JJ ;_: but_CC from_IN the_DT first_JJ the_DT intention_NN has_VBZ been_VBN to_TO attempt_VB to_TO render_VB dhais_NN already_RB in_IN practice_NN more_RBR skilful_JJ and_CC safe_JJ ,_, rather_RB than_IN to_TO train_VB young_JJ women_NNS to_TO the_DT profession_NN of_IN midwives_NNS ._.
The_DT arrangements_NNS ,_, moreover_RB ,_, sanctioned_VBN in_IN the_DT letter_NN of_IN 1st_CD August_NNP 1871_CD have_VBP not_RB been_VBN carried_VBN out_RP ._.
Dr._NNP Charles_NNP would_MD have_VB made_VBN the_DT case_NN clearer_NN had_VBD he_PRP given_VBN some_DT information_NN regarding_VBG the_DT age_NN ,_, caste_NN ,_, social_JJ position_NN and_CC antecedents_NNS of_IN these_DT women_NNS ._.
There_EX can_MD be_VB no_DT doubt_NN that_IN the_DT experiment_NN would_MD be_VB more_JJR promising_NN in_IN a_DT separate_JJ lying-in-hospital_JJ with_IN separate_JJ compound_NN and_CC quarters_NNS provided_VBD for_IN the_DT nurses_NNS either_CC in_IN the_DT hospital_NN or_CC in_IN the_DT compound_NN ._.
This_DT however_RB does_VBZ not_RB exist_VB now_RB ,_, and_CC I_PRP would_MD propose_VB that_IN the_DT three_CD females_NNS who_WP have_VBP shown_VBN such_JJ aptitude_NN in_IN acquiring_VBG theoretical_JJ knowledge_NN should_MD be_VB retained_VBN until_IN Dr._NNP Charles_NNP considers_VBZ them_PRP fitted_VBD to_TO practice_NN as_IN nurse-midwives_NNS skilfully_RB ,_, that_IN no_DT more_JJR young_JJ females_NNS should_MD be_VB entertained_VBN for_IN instruction_NN ,_, that_IN if_IN possible_JJ elderly_JJ dhais_NN in_IN actual_JJ practice_NN should_MD be_VB recruited_VBN to_TO fill_VB up_RP vacancies_NNS and_CC maintain_VB the_DT sanctioned_JJ strength_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT six_CD women_NNS under_IN instruction_NN should_MD be_VB lodged_VBN in_IN one_CD place_NN close_RB to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ,_, and_CC looked_VBD after_IN by_IN a_DT respectable_JJ elderly_JJ native_JJ female_NN on_IN a_DT salary_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
18_CD a_DT month_NN ._.
If_IN these_DT conditions_NNS can_MD not_RB be_VB realized_VBN ,_, it_PRP would_MD be_VB well_RB to_TO discontinue_VB the_DT experiment_NN until_IN a_DT separate_JJ lying-in-hospital_NN has_VBZ been_VBN provided_VBN ._.
It_PRP might_MD then_RB be_VB tried_VBN with_IN better_JJR prospects_NNS of_IN success_NN ._.
Finances_NNS ._.
20_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ satisfactory_JJ to_TO find_VB that_DT considerable_JJ savings_NNS have_VBP been_VBN effected_VBN on_IN the_DT budget_NN allowance_NN under_IN several_JJ heads_NNS ._.
The_DT figures_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, refer_VBP to_TO the_DT calendar_NN year_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT budget_NN grant_NN covers_VBZ the_DT financial_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO say_VB on_IN what_WDT principle_NN the_DT calcu-_JJ lations_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN ._.
The_DT subject_NN will_MD be_VB more_RBR appropriately_RB treated_VBN when_WRB considering_VBG the_DT budget_NN grant_NN of_IN the_DT ensuing_VBG year_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Chevers_NNP has_VBZ appended_VBN to_TO his_PRP$ report_NN a_DT statement_NN of_IN legacies_NNS and_CC other_JJ monies_NNS which_WDT have_VBP from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN become_VB available_JJ for_IN increasing_VBG the_DT comfort_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN or_CC being_VBG expended_VBN for_IN the_DT benefit_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS ._.
There_EX seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN a_DT disposition_NN to_TO accumulate_VB such_JJ funds_NNS ._.
I_PRP can_MD not_RB perceive_VB the_DT necessity_NN or_CC advantage_NN of_IN doing_VBG so_RB ,_, as_IN all_PDT the_DT wants_VBZ of_IN the_DT hospital_NN are_VBP met_VBN and_CC are_VBP likely_JJ to_TO be_VB met_VBN by_IN Government_NNP in_IN a_DT liberal_JJ spirit_NN ._.
I_PRP would_MD accordingly_RB recommend_VB that_IN the_DT interest_NN of_IN invested_VBN money_NN be_VB expend-_JJ ed_NN as_IN it_PRP becomes_VBZ due_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN floating_VBG balances_NNS be_VB utilized_VBN in_IN adding_VBG to_TO the_DT amenities_NNS of_IN hospital_JJ life_NN ._.
21_CD ._.
I_PRP have_VBP much_JJ pleasure_NN in_IN stating_VBG that_IN the_DT affairs_NNS of_IN this_DT hospital_NN have_VBP been_VBN conducted_VBN with_IN their_PRP$ wonted_VBN ability_NN and_CC skill_NN by_IN the_DT distinguished_VBN medical_JJ officers_NNS who_WP have_VBP held_VBN office_NN in_IN this_DT institution_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
THE_DT GENERAL_NNP HOSPITAL_NNP ._.
22_CD ._.
DR._NNP EWART_NNP 's_POS report_NN is_VBZ most_RBS able_JJ and_CC interesting_JJ ,_, and_CC presents_VBZ a_DT valuable_JJ and_CC instructive_JJ view_NN of_IN the_DT medical_JJ transactions_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC an_DT excellent_JJ comparison_NN of_IN the_DT results_NNS of_IN 1871_CD with_IN those_DT of_IN previous_JJ years_NNS ._.

Advantage_NN of_IN early_JJ treatment_NN ._.
23_CD ._.
I_PRP would_MD draw_VB particular_JJ attention_NN to_TO the_DT remarks_NNS made_VBD regarding_VBG the_DT propriety_NN of_IN sending_VBG cases_NNS for_IN treatment_NN during_IN the_DT earlier_JJR stages_NNS of_IN disease_NN ,_, when_WRB remedies_NNS are_VBP found_VBN to_TO be_VB of_IN most_JJS avail_NN ._.

15_CD CALCUTTA_NNP MEDICAL_NNP INSTITUTIONS_NNP ._.
24_CD ._.
The_DT account_NN which_WDT Dr._NNP Ewart_NNP gives_VBZ regarding_VBG the_DT advantages_NNS gained_VBN in_IN a_DT certain_JJ class_NN of_IN cases_NNS from_IN the_DT employment_NN of_IN Dieulafoy_NNP 's_POS pneumatic_JJ aspirator_NN ,_, is_VBZ worthy_JJ of_IN notice_NN ._.
An_DT instrument_NN of_IN this_DT description_NN has_VBZ recently_RB been_VBN supplied_VBN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ._.
Dieulafoy_NNP 's_POS pneu-_JJ matic_JJ aspirator_NN ._.
25_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ very_RB satisfactory_JJ to_TO observe_VB that_DT when_WRB tested_VBN by_IN surgical_JJ and_CC puerperal_JJ cases_NNS ,_, this_DT hospital_NN is_VBZ so_RB free_JJ from_IN those_DT insalubrious_JJ influences_NNS commonly_RB indicated_VBN by_IN the_DT term_NN hos-_JJ pitalism_NN ,_, which_WDT result_VBP from_IN the_DT aggregation_NN of_IN a_DT certain_JJ class_NN of_IN cases_NNS in_IN improperly_RB constructed_VBN and_CC insufficiently_RB ventilated_VBN buildings_NNS ._.
The_DT results_NNS which_WDT experience_NN has_VBZ shown_VBN to_TO be_VB due_JJ to_TO these_DT influences_NNS ,_, have_VBP been_VBN for_IN many_JJ years_NNS painfully_RB manifest_JJS in_IN the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
Dr._NNP Ewart_NNP employs_VBZ this_DT immunity_NN as_IN one_CD argument_NN for_IN extending_VBG the_DT surgical_JJ practice_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
I_PRP admit_VBP the_DT force_NN of_IN the_DT argument_NN ,_, and_CC recognise_VB the_DT desirability_NN of_IN the_DT pro-_JJ posal_NN ;_: but_CC I_PRP am_VBP opposed_VBN ,_, both_DT for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS and_CC the_DT hospital_NN ,_, to_TO locating_VBG surgical_JJ cases_NNS in_IN the_DT basement_NN rooms_NNS of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT wards_NNS now_RB occupied_VBN by_IN the_DT sick_NN of_IN the_DT regiment_NN of_IN British_JJ Infantry_NNP stationed_VBD in_IN Fort_NNP William_NNP are_VBP added_VBN to_TO the_DT General_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, the_DT assignment_NN of_IN a_DT certain_JJ number_NN of_IN beds_NNS to_TO the_DT class_NN of_IN persons_NNS and_CC cases_NNS alluded_VBD to_TO by_IN the_DT Surgeon_NNP will_MD be_VB in_IN every_DT respect_NN a_DT good_JJ measure_NN ._.
Absence_NN of_IN hospi-_JJ talism_NN ._.
Proposal_NN for_IN ex-_JJ tending_VBG the_DT sur-_JJ gical_JJ practice_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
26_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Ewart_NNP also_RB proposes_VBZ that_IN an_DT out-door_JJ department_NN should_MD be_VB added_VBN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ._.
I_PRP agree_VBP that_IN this_DT would_MD be_VB a_DT great_JJ advantage_NN to_TO the_DT sick_JJ poor_JJ of_IN southern_JJ Calcutta_NNP ;_: but_CC if_IN the_DT present_JJ staff_NN is_VBZ employed_VBN to_TO the_DT full_JJ ,_, an_DT arrangement_NN of_IN this_DT kind_NN would_MD necessitate_VB an_DT increased_JJ staff_NN ._.
On_IN this_DT subject_JJ Dr._NNP Ewart_NNP will_MD be_VB asked_VBN to_TO submit_VB a_DT special_JJ report_NN ._.
I_PRP would_MD remark_VB ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT Alipore_NNP ,_, Bhowanipore_NNP ,_, and_CC Aratoon_NNP Apear_NNP dispensaries_NNS already_RB provide_VBP out-door_JJ medical_JJ and_CC surgical_JJ relief_NN for_IN the_DT sick_JJ poor_JJ of_IN the_DT suburbs_NN of_IN Bhowanipore_NNP ,_, Alipore_NNP ,_, and_CC Garden_NNP Reach_NNP ._.
An_DT out-door_JJ de-_JJ partment_NN pro-_NN posed_VBD ._.
27_CD ._.
The_DT Surgeon_NNP 's_POS remarks_NNS on_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN dieting_VBG are_VBP important_JJ ._.
The_DT dieting_NN of_IN the_DT sick_NN is_VBZ obviously_RB the_DT alphabet_NN of_IN hospital_JJ management_NN ,_, and_CC too_RB much_JJ care_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB bestowed_VBN upon_IN the_DT subject_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Ewart_NNP will_MD be_VB asked_VBN to_TO submit_VB a_DT definite_NN proposal_NN regarding_VBG the_DT provi-_JJ sion_NN of_IN covered_JJ trays_NNS or_CC doolies_NNS for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN serving_VBG the_DT food_NN warm_NN to_TO the_DT patients_NNS ._.
The_DT public_NN contract_NN system_NN evidently_RB works_VBZ satisfactorily_RB in_IN this_DT hospital_NN ._.
Dieting_VBG 28_CD ._.
The_DT improvements_NNS effected_VBN in_IN the_DT manner_NN of_IN disposing_VBG of_IN hospital_JJ sewage_NN are_VBP in_IN every_DT respect_NN a_DT subject_NN of_IN congratulation_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP hope_VBP that_IN ere_RB long_RB the_DT arrangements_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN discussion_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN introducing_VBG the_DT pure_NN municipal_JJ water_NN into_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, and_CC providing_VBG for_IN it_PRP a_DT system_NN of_IN water_NN sewerage_NN in_IN connection_NN with_IN the_DT general_JJ combined_VBN drainage_NN and_CC sewerage_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB satisfactorily_RB completed_VBN ._.
Conservancy_NN ._.
29_CD ._.
Surgeon-Major_JJ J._NNP P._NNP Brougham_NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD held_VBN the_DT office_NN of_IN Surgeon_NNP to_TO this_DT hospital_NN during_IN the_DT previous_JJ twelve_NN years_NNS with_IN much_JJ credit_NN to_TO himself_PRP and_CC great_JJ benefit_NN to_TO the_DT community_NN ,_, retired_VBN from_IN the_DT service_NN on_IN the_DT 31st_CD of_IN March_NNP ,_, and_CC was_VBD succeeded_VBN by_IN Surgeon_NNP J._NNP Ewart_NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, under_IN whose_WP$ able_JJ supervision_NN the_DT institution_NN promises_VBZ to_TO maintain_VB its_PRP$ well_NN earned_VBN popularity_NN ._.
Changes_NNS in_IN the_DT staff_NN ._.
30_CD ._.
The_DT office_NN of_IN Second_NNP Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP having_VBG become_VBN vacant_JJ towards_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN 1870_CD by_IN the_DT appointment_NN of_IN the_DT late_JJ Assistant-Surgeon_NNP J._NNP Fawcus_NNP to_TO the_DT office_NN of_IN Inspector-General_NNP of_IN Jails_NNP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD decided_VBN to_TO dissever_VB the_DT superintendence_NN of_IN the_DT Alipore_NNP and_CC Russa_NNP jails_NNS from_IN the_DT Second_NNP Assistant_NNP Surgeoncy_NNP of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, and_CC constitute_VB the_DT former_JJ a_DT sole_JJ and_CC separate_JJ charge_NN ._.
As_IN the_DT full_JJ salary_NN which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN drawn_VBN for_IN the_DT combined_JJ duty_NN was_VBD allotted_VBN to_TO the_DT Alipore_NNP Jail_NNP charge_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP objected_VBD to_TO the_DT appoint-_JJ ment_NN of_IN an_DT additional_JJ medical_JJ officer_NN at_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP ,_, it_PRP become_VBD a_DT question_NN how_WRB the_DT hospital_NN duties_NNS could_MD best_RB be_VB provided_VBN for_IN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD finally_RB resolved_VBN ,_, after_IN considerable_JJ discus-_JJ sion_NN (_( Bengal_JJ Government_NNP letters_NNS Nos_NNP ._.

3_CD ._.
One_CD woman_NN who_WP came_VBD to_TO the_DT hospital_NN for_IN a_DT day_NN is_VBZ not_RB included_VBN in_IN the_DT following_JJ statement_NN ._.
Ten_CD women_NNS have_VBP been_VBN under_IN training_NN ;_: two_CD of_IN them_PRP have_VBP been_VBN dismissed_VBN for_IN immoral_JJ conduct_NN ;_: another_DT dismissed_VBD herself_NN it_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN when_WRB she_PRP found_VBD that_IN she_PRP was_VBD pregnant_JJ ._.

One_CD woman_NN ceased_VBD attending_VBG after_IN a_DT fortnight_NN 's_POS instruction_NN ._.
Results_NNS ._.
The_DT above_JJ form_NN five_CD instances_NNS of_IN what_WP may_MD be_VB taken_VBN as_IN failures_NNS connected_VBN with_IN the_DT experiment_NN of_IN educating_VBG nurses_NNS ._.

One_CD woman_NN at_IN present_JJ under_IN training_NN has_VBZ been_VBN too_RB short_JJ a_DT time_NN with_IN us_PRP to_TO say_VB much_JJ about_IN her_PRP ,_, but_CC she_PRP promises_VBZ to_TO do_VB well_RB ._.
One_CD woman_NN after_IN 18_CD months_NNS '_POS training_NN is_VBZ known_VBN to_TO have_VB made_VBN very_RB considerable_JJ progress_NN ,_, but_CC her_PRP$ friends_NNS decided_VBD that_IN she_PRP should_MD not_RB practise_VB ,_, and_CC she_PRP ceased_VBD attending_VBG at_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.

4_CD ._.
On_IN the_DT 3rd_CD of_IN January_NNP 1872_CD I_PRP requested_VBD Meer_NNP Ashruf_NNP Ali_NNP ,_, the_DT Native_NNP Teacher_NNP of_IN Midwifery_NNP ,_, and_CC Baboo_NNP Kristo_NNP Dass_NNP Sen_NNP ,_, the_DT Goodeve_NNP scholar_NN ,_, to_TO associate_VB themselves_PRP with_IN me_PRP and_CC form_VB a_DT Committee_NNP of_IN Examination_NNP to_TO test_VB the_DT proficiency_NN of_IN the_DT Native_NNP midwives_NNS ._.
The_DT examination_NN was_VBD limited_VBN to_TO the_DT subject_NN of_IN natural_JJ labor_NN and_CC the_DT management_NN of_IN ordinary_JJ cases_NNS ._.
I_PRP suggested_VBD all_PDT the_DT questions_NNS in_IN English_NNP ,_, but_CC from_IN my_PRP$ ignorance_NN of_IN the_DT language_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT examination_NN was_VBD conducted_VBN ,_, I_PRP can_MD only_RB offer_VB a_DT guarded_JJ opinion_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT result_NN ._.
All_DT three_CD candidates_NNS showed_VBD a_DT ``_`` good_JJ ''_'' knowledge_NN of_IN the_DT subject_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP was_VBD peculiarly_RB struck_VBN by_IN the_DT volubility_NN with_IN which_WDT they_PRP answered_VBD and_CC the_DT readiness_NN with_IN which_WDT they_PRP understood_VBD each_DT question_NN which_WDT was_VBD put_VBN to_TO them_PRP ._.
Having_VBG satisfied_VBN myself_PRP that_IN they_PRP possessed_VBD the_DT neces-_JJ sary_JJ information_NN on_IN this_DT large_JJ and_CC important_JJ division_NN of_IN their_PRP$ subject_NN ,_, these_DT three_CD dhais_NNS were_VBD directed_VBN to_TO get_VB up_RP in_IN the_DT same_JJ way_NN the_DT subject_NN of_IN preternatural_JJ labor_NN ;_: when_WRB they_PRP seem_VBP to_TO show_VB a_DT sufficient_JJ general_JJ knowledge_NN of_IN this_DT further_JJ subject_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ proposed_VBN again_RB to_TO put_VB them_PRP to_TO a_DT similar_JJ formal_JJ test_NN ._.
The_DT names_NNS of_IN these_DT three_CD pupils_NNS are_VBP mentioned_VBN in_IN the_DT margin_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP good_JJ reasons_NNS for_IN believing_VBG that_IN the_DT fitness_NN they_PRP showed_VBD to_TO learn_VB was_VBD exceptional_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN none_NN of_IN the_DT other_JJ women_NNS we_PRP have_VBP had_VBN under_IN training_NN would_MD at_IN any_DT time_NN have_VBP attained_VBN to_TO such_JJ proficiency_NN ,_, even_RB had_VBD they_PRP not_RB been_VBN dismissed_VBN or_CC absented_VBN themselves_PRP ._.

Result_NN ._.
5_CD ._.

6_CD ._.

7_CD ._.
In_IN my_PRP$ first_JJ report_NN on_IN the_DT subject_NN I_PRP drew_VBD prominent_JJ attention_NN to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN if_IN the_DT Government_NNP undertook_NN to_TO train_VB women_NNS in_IN a_DT metropolis_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD been_VBN brought_VBN from_IN a_DT quiet_JJ life_NN in_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, they_PRP must_MD be_VB prepared_VBN for_IN the_DT most_RBS unpleasant_JJ contingencies_NNS ._.
Thirty_NNP per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT women_NNS included_VBD in_IN this_DT experiment_NN having_VBG gone_VBN astray_JJ ,_, presents_NNS to_TO my_PRP$ mind_NN a_DT result_NN so_RB appalling_JJ ,_, that_IN I_PRP trust_VBP I_PRP may_MD not_RB be_VB asked_VBN to_TO continue_VB an_DT undertaking_JJ necessarily_RB attended_VBD with_IN such_JJ unhappy_JJ results_NNS ._.

8_CD ._.
The_DT fact_NN that_IN half_NN of_IN the_DT women_NNS have_VBP proved_VBN themselves_PRP competent_VBP to_TO acquire_VB a_DT very_RB fair_JJ share_NN of_IN such_JJ knowledge_NN that_IN they_PRP can_MD make_VB an_DT average_JJ show_NN at_IN an_DT examination_NN ,_, is_VBZ most_RBS encouraging_JJ ._.
It_PRP proves_VBZ that_IN if_IN the_DT Government_NNP choose_NN to_TO conduct_VB the_DT experiment_NN at_IN a_DT 28_CD REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP distance_NN from_IN the_DT metropolis_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ certain_JJ to_TO be_VB attended_VBN with_IN a_DT modicum_NN of_IN success_NN ._.
I_PRP feel_VBP convinced_JJ that_IN such_PDT a_DT move_NN would_MD be_VB one_CD in_IN a_DT right_JJ direction_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN much_JJ good_NN would_MD be_VB done_VBN ._.
The_DT expense_NN incurred_VBN by_IN European_JJ Governments_NNS for_IN training_VBG midwives_NNS is_VBZ very_RB great_JJ ;_: and_CC to_TO effect_NN the_DT same_JJ result_NN in_IN India_NNP would_MD necessarily_RB involve_VB a_DT large_JJ outlay_NN of_IN money_NN ._.
The_DT Native_NNP women_NNS ,_, even_RB when_WRB showing_VBG most_JJS aptitude_JJ to_TO learn_VB theoretically_RB ,_, have_VBP shown_VBN so_RB little_JJ fitness_NN to_TO do_VB anything_NN with_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS ,_, that_IN I_PRP question_VBP more_RBR than_IN ever_RB whether_IN such_JJ a_DT reasonable_JJ amount_NN of_IN saving_NN of_IN life_NN and_CC suffering_NN among_IN the_DT population_NN would_MD ever_RB be_VB attained_VBN to_TO ,_, that_IN any_DT such_JJ appropriation_NN of_IN public_JJ funds_NNS would_MD ,_, in_IN the_DT present_JJ circumstances_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, be_VB justifiable_JJ ._.
Memo_NNP ._.
by_IN G._NNP SAUNDERS_NNP ,_, ESQ._NNP ,_, Deputy_NNP Inspector-General_NNP of_IN Hospitals,29_NNP MEDICAL_NNP COLLEGE_NNP HOSPITAL_NNP ._.
solicited_VBN ._.
The_DT mortality_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT European_JJ wards_NNS had_VBD never_RB been_VBN so_RB remarkably_RB high_JJ as_IN in_IN the_DT Native_NNP side_NN of_IN the_DT building_NN ,_, and_CC therefore_RB less_JJR benefit_NN could_MD be_VB expected_VBN from_IN the_DT administration_NN of_IN better_JJR food_NN or_CC a_DT more_RBR liberal_JJ use_NN of_IN extras_NNS there_RB ._.

3_CD ._.

Dieulafoy_NNP 's_POS pneu-_JJ matic_JJ aspirator_NN ._.

Typhoid_NNP fever_NN ._.
(_( 4_CD ._. )_)
Typhoid_NNP fever_NN has_VBZ long_RB been_VBN recognized_VBN in_IN this_DT hospital_NN ._.
The_DT first_JJ cases_NNS noted_VBN in_IN Calcutta_NNP were_VBD observed_VBN and_CC described_VBN here_RB by_IN Dr._NNP Scriven_NNP ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, in_IN 1853_CD ._.
Since_IN then_RB scarcely_RB a_DT year_NN has_VBZ passed_VBN without_IN its_PRP$ complement_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN typhoid_JJ fever_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT N_NNP 50_CD REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP seven_CD years_NNS under_IN review_NN ,_, 85_CD cases_NNS have_VBP been_VBN diagnosed_VBN and_CC entered_VBN in_IN the_DT returns_NNS ._.

The_DT Hospital_NNP Library.58_NNP REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP Rules_NNP for_IN the_DT Admission_NNP of_IN Patients_NNPS into_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP General_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
1_CD ._.
Patients_NNS received_VBD into_IN the_DT General_NNP Hospital_NNP are_VBP those_DT whose_WP$ expenses_NNS are_VBP defrayed_VBN by_IN themselves_PRP ,_, and_CC seamen_NNS belonging_VBG to_TO Her_NNP Majesty_NNP 's_POS ships_NNS and_CC merchant_NN vessels_NNS under_IN Act_NNP III_NNP ._.
(_( B._NNP C._NNP )_) of_IN 1867_CD ._.
All_DT seaman_JJ belonging_NN to_TO vessels_NNS in_IN port_NN who_WP may_MD require_VB medical_JJ treatment_NN in_IN hospital_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB received_VBN so_RB far_RB as_IN available_JJ accommodation_NN permits_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
No_DT seaman_NN belonging_VBG to_TO any_DT ship_NN in_IN the_DT port_NN will_MD be_VB received_VBN at_IN this_DT institution_NN without_IN the_DT production_NN of_IN a_DT requisition_NN signed_VBN by_IN the_DT Master_NNP or_CC Commanding_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT vessel_NN to_TO which_WDT such_JJ seaman_NN belongs_NNS ,_, except_IN in_IN cases_NNS of_IN great_JJ emergency_NN ,_, when_WRB he_PRP will_MD be_VB admitted_VBN by_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN on_IN duty_NN in_IN anticipation_NN of_IN the_DT order_NN being_VBG sent_VBN ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT authorities_NNS authorized_VBD to_TO grant_VB the_DT admission_NN of_IN patients_NNS into_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP General_NNP Hospital_NNP are_VBP Captains_NNP of_IN Her_NNP Majesty_NNP 's_POS Navy_NNP ,_, Captains_NNP of_IN the_DT Government_NNP Marine_NNP ,_, the_DT Master_NNP Attendant_NNP ,_, the_DT Marine_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, the_DT Garrison_NNP Staff_NNP of_IN Fort_NNP William_NNP ,_, and_CC house-_JJ holders_NNS of_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, they_PRP being_VBG answerable_JJ for_IN the_DT hospital_NN expenses_NNS ;_: the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP and_CC Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT District_NNP Charitable_NNP Society_NNP are_VBP authorized_VBN to_TO give_VB to_TO paupers_NNS free_JJ tickets_NNS of_IN admission_NN into_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
4_CD ._.

Committee_NNP ._.
MRS._NNP BEEBEE_NNP ,_, MRS._NNP ROWE_NNP ,_, ``_`` CURTOYS_NNP ,_, ``_`` SANDERSON_NNP ,_, ``_`` DAMPIER_NNP ,_, ``_`` STEPHENSON_NNP ,_, MISS_NNP MILMAN_NNP ,_, ``_`` WILKINSON_NNP ,_, MRS._NNP BROWNLOW_NNP ATLAY_NNP ,_, Honorary_NNP Secretary_NNP ._.
MRS._NNP COWELL_NNP ,_, Honorary_NNP Treasurer_NNP ._.
THIS_NNP institution_NN has_VBZ been_VBN in_IN existence_NN twelve_CD years_NNS ,_, and_CC has_VBZ not_RB decreased_VBN in_IN usefulness_JJ ,_, as_IN will_MD be_VB seen_VBN by_IN the_DT reports_NNS of_IN the_DT two_CD principal_JJ Medical_JJ Officers_NNS ,_, Dr._NNP Chevers_NNP and_CC Dr._NNP Ewart_NNP ._.
There_EX are_VBP 14_CD nurses_NNS in_IN the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, including_VBG the_DT Matron_NNP ,_, Mrs._NNP Bowler_NNP ,_, and_CC 9_CD only_RB in_IN the_DT General_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, for_IN the_DT funds_NNS being_VBG low_JJ last_JJ year_NN ,_, the_DT Matron_NNP ,_, Mrs._NNP Hickey_NNP ,_, offered_VBD to_TO take_VB more_JJR of_IN the_DT work_NN and_CC so_RB dispense_JJ with_IN the_DT services_NNS of_IN one_CD nurse_NN ._.
She_PRP and_CC Mrs._NNP Bowler_NNP are_VBP most_RBS hardworking_JJ and_CC obliging_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT Secretary_NNP finds_VBZ that_IN the_DT women_NNS recommended_VBN by_IN them_PRP almost_RB invariably_RB make_VB the_DT best_JJS and_CC most_RBS respectable_JJ nurses_NNS ._.
In_IN consequence_NN of_IN the_DT ready_JJ response_NN made_VBD to_TO the_DT appeal_NN at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN last_JJ year_NN ,_, the_DT Committee_NNP find_VBP themselves_PRP with_IN a_DT balance_NN in_IN hand_NN ,_, which_WDT they_PRP think_VBP will_MD allow_VB them_PRP to_TO offer_VB two_CD nurses_NNS to_TO Dr._NNP Chevers_NNP for_IN the_DT wards_NNS which_WDT hitherto_VBP have_VBP only_RB been_VBN attended_VBN to_TO by_IN coolies_NNS ._.
Three_CD have_VBP long_RB been_VBN wished_VBN for_IN ,_, and_CC if_IN quarters_NNS can_MD be_VB found_VBN for_IN two_CD ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ earnestly_RB hoped_VBN that_IN the_DT present_JJ rate_NN of_IN subscriptions_NNS may_MD be_VB maintained_VBN ,_, without_IN which_WDT it_PRP would_MD be_VB impossible_JJ to_TO provide_VB for_IN the_DT extra_JJ expense_NN ._.
As_IN much_JJ care_NN as_IN possible_JJ is_VBZ taken_VBN in_IN selecting_VBG the_DT nurses_NNS ,_, but_CC very_RB great_JJ difficulty_NN exists_NNS in_IN finding_VBG suitable_JJ women_NNS ._.
Numbers_NNS present_VBP themselves_PRP simply_RB because_IN they_PRP want_VBP a_DT home_NN ,_, whilst_WP they_PRP know_VBP nothing_NN of_IN work_NN or_CC nursing_NN ._.
Even_RB the_DT most_RBS willing_JJ have_VBP to_TO learn_VB ,_, which_WDT entails_VBZ a_DT great_JJ deal_NN of_IN extra_JJ labor_NN on_IN the_DT matrons_NNS ._.
This_DT can_MD only_RB be_VB remedied_VBN by_IN a_DT training_NN establishment_NN for_IN nurses_NNS ,_, which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB hoped_VBN we_PRP shall_MD see_VB at_IN some_DT future_JJ day_NN in_IN Calcutta_NNP ._.
Thanking_VBG the_DT public_NN for_IN past_JJ help_NN and_CC begging_VBG to_TO remind_VB them_PRP that_IN there_EX are_VBP frequently_RB 200_CD ,_, mostly_RB Europeans_NNPS ,_, at_IN one_CD time_NN in_IN the_DT General_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT same_JJ number_NN ,_, Euro-_JJ peans_NNS and_CC Natives_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, not_RB including_VBG the_DT extra_JJ Native_NNP wards_NNS ,_, this_DT report_NN may_MD be_VB best_RBS concluded_VBN with_IN the_DT valuable_JJ testimony_NN of_IN the_DT chief_JJ medical_JJ officers_NNS of_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS ,_, contained_VBN in_IN the_DT following_JJ letters_NNS ._.
EMMA_NNP ATLAY_NNP ,_, Honorary_NNP Secretary_NNP ._.
I_PRP HAVE_VBP again_RB great_JJ satisfaction_NN in_IN stating_VBG that_IN during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN Mrs._NNP Bowler_NNP ,_, the_DT Matron_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT nurses_NNS of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP Nurses_NNP '_POS Institution_NNP under_IN her_PRP$ ,_, have_VBP for_IN the_DT most_JJS part_NN worked_VBD most_RBS efficiently_RB and_CC usefully_RB ,_, and_CC have_VBP rendered_VBN an_DT incalculable_JJ amount_NN of_IN valuable_JJ aid_NN to_TO the_DT sick_NN in_IN this_DT hospital_NN ._.
I_PRP can_MD scarcely_RB imagine_VB a_DT public_JJ charity_NN better_RBR calculated_VBN to_TO do_VB good_JJ ,_, both_DT in_IN its_PRP$ objects_NNS and_CC in_IN its_PRP$ administration_NN ,_, than_IN is_VBZ the_DT institution_NN in_IN question_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT constant_JJ source_NN of_IN regret_NN to_TO the_DT officers_NNS of_IN this_DT hospital_NN that_IN the_DT funds_NNS of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP Nurses_NNP '_POS Institution_NN are_VBP still_RB so_RB low_JJ as_IN to_TO be_VB inadequate_JJ to_TO provide_VB us_PRP with_IN a_DT full_JJ staff_NN of_IN nurses_NNS ._.
MEDICAL_NNP COLLEGE_NNP HOSPITAL_NNP ;_: NORMAN_NNP CHEVERS_NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, CALCUTTA_NNP ,_, Principal_NNP ,_, Medical_NNP College_NNP ,_, and_CC Senior_NNP Physician_NNP ._.
The_DT 20th_CD January_NNP 1872_CD ._.
R_NNP 66_CD REPORT_NNP OP_NNP THE_NNP HOSPITAL_NNP NURSES_NNP '_POS INSTITUTION_NNP ._.
I_PRP HAVE_VBP been_VBN very_RB well_RB satisfied_VBN with_IN the_DT manner_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT Matron_NNP and_CC the_DT nurses_NNS have_VBP performed_VBN their_PRP$ duties_NNS during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ._.
I_PRP attribute_VBP this_DT result_NN mainly_RB to_TO the_DT careful_JJ way_NN in_IN which_WDT Mrs._NNP Hickey_NNP ,_, the_DT Matron_NNP ,_, has_VBZ carried_VBN out_RP the_DT important_JJ work_NN entrusted_VBD to_TO her_PRP$ ._.
I_PRP believe_VBP the_DT other_JJ officers_NNS of_IN the_DT hospital_NN have_VBP been_VBN equally_RB satisfied_JJ with_IN the_DT excellent_JJ nursing_NN of_IN the_DT sick_NN ._.
It_PRP would_MD now_RB be_VB impossible_JJ to_TO get_VB on_IN satisfactorily_RB without_IN the_DT nurses_NNS ,_, so_RB absolutely_RB '_POS essential_JJ have_VBP they_PRP become_VBP to_TO the_DT thorough_JJ working_NN of_IN this_DT institution_NN ._.

'Moribunds_NNS ._. ''_''
50_CD ._.

I_PRP observe_VBP that_IN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN the_DT practice_NN to_TO exclude_VB ``_`` moribund_NN ''_'' patients_NNS altogether_RB from_IN the_DT returns_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT term_NN as_IN hitherto_NN employed_VBN has_VBZ been_VBN indefinite_RB ._.

Definition_NN of_IN ``_`` moribund_NN ._. ''_''
The_DT following_JJ tabular_JJ statement_NN of_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN mortality_NN per_IN thousand_NN of_IN the_DT decade_NN is_VBZ of_IN great_JJ interest_NN ,_, as_IN showing_VBG the_DT great_JJ diminution_NN this_DT has_VBZ undergone_NN of_IN late_JJ years_NNS ,_, amongst_IN both_DT christians_NNS and_CC natives_NNS treated_VBN in_IN this_DT hospital_NN ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS treated_VBN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN moribund_NN cases_NNS admitted_VBD ,_, during_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT last_JJ ten_JJ years_NNS ,_, are_VBP given_VBN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO show_VB that_IN this_DT decrease_NN is_VBZ not_RB due_JJ to_TO an_DT increased_VBN popularity_NN of_IN the_DT institution_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT consequent_JJ admission_NN on_IN that_DT account_NN of_IN a_DT larger_JJR number_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN a_DT milder_NN type_NN ,_, and_CC therefore_RB more_RBR amenable_JJ to_TO treatment_NN ,_, but_CC that_IN other_JJ causes_NNS must_MD be_VB sought_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB observed_VBN that_IN the_DT most_RBS marked_JJ ,_, and_CC an_DT increasing_VBG ,_, diminu-_JJ tion_NN in_IN mortality_NN has_VBZ taken_VBN place_NN during_IN the_DT last_JJ three_CD years_NNS of_IN the_DT series_NN ,_, corresponding_VBG with_IN the_DT introduction_NN of_IN the_DT municipal_JJ water-supply_NN to_TO Calcutta_NNP in_IN point_NN of_IN time_NN ._.
This_DT coincidence_NN would_MD seem_VB to_TO point_VB towards_RP the_DT conclusion_NN that_IN the_DT habitual_JJ use_NN of_IN pure_NN water_NN has_VBZ lessened_VBN generally_RB the_DT gravity_NN and_CC fatality_NN of_IN the_DT diseases_NNS of_IN the_DT class_NN of_IN people_NNS from_IN which_WDT the_DT patients_NNS of_IN this_DT hospital_NN are_VBP derived_VBN ._.
It_PRP will_MD also_RB be_VB shown_VBN that_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN admissions_NNS for_IN cholera_NN (_( though_IN not_RB the_DT mortality_NN of_IN the_DT cases_NNS )_) ,_, and_CC the_DT deaths_NNS by_IN pyæmia_NN after_IN operation_NN ,_, have_VBP also_RB been_VBN diminished_VBN during_IN the_DT same_JJ period_NN ._.

11,000_CD )_) ,_, being_VBG the_DT Maharjah_NNP of_IN Ulwar_NNP and_CC Gopaul_NNP Lall_NNP Tagore_NNP 's_POS benefactions_NNS ,_, only_RB became_VBD avail-_JJ able_JJ in_IN the_DT year_NN 1870_CD ._.
A_DT demi-official_JJ correspondence_NN ,_, which_WDT took_VBD place_NN between_IN the_DT late_JJ Lieute-_JJ nant-Governor_JJ ,_, Sir_NNP W._NNP Grey_NNP ,_, and_CC myself_PRP ,_, is_VBZ evidence_NN of_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT appro-_JJ priate_NN expenditure_NN upon_IN the_DT hospital_NN of_IN a_DT small_JJ sum_NN of_IN this_DT kind_NN is_VBZ by_IN no_DT means_NNS so_RB plain_RB and_CC easy_VB a_DT matter_NN as_IN might_MD at_IN first_JJ sight_NN appear_NN ._.
Kajah_NNP Abdool_NNP Ghani_NNP of_IN Dacca_NNP having_VBG bestowed_VBN the_DT sum_NN of_IN rupees_NNS eight_CD thousand_CD upon_IN the_DT hospi-_JJ tal_NN ,_, His_PRP$ Honor_NNP desired_VBD me_PRP to_TO suggest_VB the_DT proper_JJ manner_NN of_IN expending_VBG this_DT gift_NN ._.
I_PRP very_RB strongly_RB urged_VBD the_DT need_NN for_IN either_CC a_DT porter_NN 's_POS lodge_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT place_NN for_IN the_DT re-_JJ ception_NN of_IN noisy_JJ patients_NNS ,_, the_DT least_JJS expensive_JJ of_IN the_DT public_JJ works_NNS ,_, for_IN which_WDT Government_NNP grants_NNS had_VBD been_VBN solicited_VBN ,_, without_IN success_NN ,_, up_RB to_TO the_DT date_NN of_IN my_PRP$ last_JJ annual_JJ report_NN ._.

3_CD ._.

It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN resolved_VBN ,_, after_IN much_JJ consideration_NN by_IN His_PRP$ Honor_NNP the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP ,_, for_IN the_DT present_JJ not_RB to_TO introduce_VB the_DT water_NN closet_NN system_NN into_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
In_IN lieu_NN of_IN this_DT and_CC the_DT plan_NN now_RB in_IN operation_NN ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN decided_VBN to_TO maintain_VB the_DT dry_JJ system_NN within_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO combine_VB it_PRP with_IN the_DT water-carriage_JJ system_NN of_IN the_DT Calcutta_NNP municipality_NN as_IN follows:82_JJ REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP CALCUTTA_NNP MEDICAL_NNP INSTITUTIONS_NNP ._.
of_IN the_DT Government_NNP order_NN is_VBZ to_TO submit_VB an_DT indent_NN on_IN Her_NNP Majesty_NNP 's_POS Secretary_NNP of_IN State_NNP ._.
I_PRP am_VBP of_IN opinion_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN on_IN representation_NN ,_, an_DT exception_NN may_MD fairly_RB be_VB made_VBN in_IN favor_NN of_IN a_DT great_JJ charity_NN like_IN the_DT General_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, which_WDT ministers_VBZ so_RB much_JJ to_TO the_DT alleviation_NN and_CC cure_NN of_IN the_DT diseases_NNS from_IN which_WDT the_DT mercantile_NN marine_NN suffer_NN within_IN its_PRP$ walls_NNS ._.
I_PRP trust_VBP the_DT Inspector-General_NNP will_MD be_VB pleased_VBN to_TO move_VB His_PRP$ Honor_NNP the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP to_TO sanction_VB the_DT continu-_JJ ance_NN of_IN the_DT practice_NN of_IN buying_VBG cheap_JJ literature_NN from_IN any_DT of_IN the_DT reading_NN clubs_NNS for_IN the_DT library_NN ._.
38_CD ._.

Nursing_NN ._.
39_CD ._.
In_IN a_DT letter_NN dated_VBD 24th_CD December_NNP ,_, to_TO Mrs._NNP Colquhoun_NNP Grant_NNP ,_, the_DT Honorary_NNP Secretary_NNP of_IN the_DT Committee_NNP of_IN the_DT Calcutta_NNP Hospital_NNP Nurses_NNP '_POS Insti-_JJ tution_NN ,_, I_PRP wrote_VBD in_IN the_DT following_JJ terms_NNS regarding_VBG the_DT nurses_NNS :_: ``_`` I_PRP have_VBP much_JJ pleasure_NN in_IN again_RB bearing_VBG testimony_NN to_TO the_DT very_RB creditable_JJ manner_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT nurses_NNS attached_VBN to_TO the_DT Presidency_NNP General_NNP Hospital_NNP performed_VBD their_PRP$ arduous_JJ and_CC highly_RB responsible_JJ duties_NNS during_IN the_DT past_JJ twelve_JJ months_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO estimate_VB the_DT important_JJ services_NNS rendered_VBN to_TO the_DT sick_JJ by_IN these_DT women_NNS ._.
So_RB much_JJ am_VBP I_PRP impressed_JJ with_IN the_DT value_NN of_IN their_PRP$ services_NNS ,_, that_IN I_PRP should_MD most_RBS gladly_RB welcome_VBP an_DT increase_NN to_TO the_DT number_NN of_IN nurses_NNS at_IN present_JJ allotted_VBN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT buildings_NNS ,_, formerly_RB occupied_VBN by_IN the_DT Native_NNP and_CC European_NNP sick_NN in_IN Fort_NNP William_NNP ,_, have_VBP been_VBN available_JJ for_IN the_DT general_JJ purpose_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
Whilst_NNP this_DT has_VBZ given_VBN more_JJR space_NN ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ entailed_VBN a_DT marked_JJ increment_NN to_TO the_DT average_JJ number_NN of_IN daily_JJ sick_NN ._.
To_TO meet_VB the_DT necessities_NNS of_IN this_DT increase_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS in_IN hospital_NN ,_, we_PRP ought_MD ,_, to_TO begin_VB with_IN ,_, to_TO be_VB furnished_VBN with_IN at_IN least_JJS two_CD more_JJR nurses_NNS in_IN addition_NN to_TO the_DT present_JJ staff_NN of_IN ten_NN nurses_NNS and_CC one_CD matron_NN ._. ''_''
During_IN the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, Mrs._NNP Atlay_NNP performed_VBD the_DT duty_NN of_IN Honorary_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Committee_NNP ._.
She_PRP has_VBZ lately_RB been_VBN ably_RB substituted_VBN by_IN Mrs._NNP Grant_NNP ,_, who_WP has_VBZ taken_VBN a_DT most_RBS active_JJ interest_NN in_IN the_DT management_NN of_IN the_DT nurses_NNS ._.
In_IN this_DT good_JJ work_NN Mrs._NNP Grant_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN admir-_JJ ably_RB assisted_VBN by_IN the_DT matron_NN ,_, Mrs._NNP Hickey_NNP ._.

40_CD ._.
I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN much_RB indebted_VBN for_IN the_DT harmonious_JJ and_CC smooth_JJ working_NN of_IN the_DT institution_NN to_TO my_PRP$ able_JJ assistants_NNS ,_, Dr._NNP W._NNP J._NNP Palmer_NNP and_CC Dr._NNP S._NNP Coull_NNP Mackenzie_NNP ._.
The_DT increased_VBN accommodation_NN ,_, consequent_NN on_IN the_DT transfer_NN of_IN the_DT building_NN from_IN the_DT military_JJ authorities_NNS to_TO the_DT surgeon_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, has_VBZ enabled_VBN me_PRP to_TO dis-_JJ tribute_NN the_DT work_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO effect_NN an_DT amount_NN of_IN decentralization_NN previously_RB im-_JJ practicable_JJ ,_, so_IN that_DT now_RB each_DT officer_NN has_VBZ charge_NN of_IN his_PRP$ complement_NN of_IN patients_NNS in_IN an_DT entirely_JJ separate_JJ and_CC distinct_JJ building_NN of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ ,_, subject_JJ to_TO the_DT control_NN and_CC supervision_NN of_IN the_DT surgeon-superintendent_NN ._.
But_CC to_TO render_VB this_DT decentra-_JJ lization_NN efficient_NN ,_, an_DT augmentation_NN of_IN the_DT establishment_NN is_VBZ needed_VBN ._.
I_PRP trust_VBP the_DT scheme_NN transmitted_VBD on_IN 21st_CD October_NNP 1872_CD ,_, may_MD meet_VB with_IN the_DT support_NN of_IN the_DT Inspector-General_JJ and_CC the_DT speedy_JJ sanction_NN of_IN Government_NNP ,_, inasmuch_RB as_IN at_IN present_JJ everything_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN on_IN at_IN a_DT rate_NN of_IN high_JJ pressure_NN ,_, which_WDT it_PRP will_MD not_RB be_VB possible_JJ to_TO sustain_VB permanently_RB ._.
Dr._NNP S._NNP C._NNP Macken-_NNP zie_NN 's_POS services_NNS ._.
41_CD ._.
I_PRP consider_VBP it_PRP but_CC due_JJ to_TO Dr._NNP S._NNP Coull_NNP Mackenzie_NNP to_TO take_VB this_DT opportu-_JJ nity_NN of_IN bringing_VBG his_PRP$ excellent_NN services_NNS to_TO the_DT notice_NN of_IN the_DT Inspector-General_NNP ._.

42_CD ._.
The_DT hospital_NN has_VBZ now_RB been_VBN provided_VBN with_IN lockers_NNS for_IN the_DT sick_JJ ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT food_NN ,_, medicine_NN ,_, and_CC small_JJ articles_NNS of_IN clothing_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, belonging_VBG to_TO each_DT patient_NN ,_, can_MD be_VB stored_VBN away_RB without_IN difficulty_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ a_DT marked_JJ improvement_NN upon_IN the_DT old_JJ plan_NN ,_, of_IN having_VBG open_JJ shelves_NNS ,_, adding_VBG much_JJ to_TO the_DT convenience_NN and_CC com-_JJ fort_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO the_DT general_JJ orderly_JJ appearance_NN of_IN the_DT wards_NNS ._.

112_CD REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP CALCUTTA_NNP MEDICAL_NNP INSTITUTIONS_NNP ._.
REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP NORTH_NNP SUBURBAN_NNP HOSPITAL_NNP ._.
Date_NNP of_IN establish-_JJ ment_NN ._.
The_DT hospital_NN was_VBD established_VBN in_IN September_NNP 1866_CD for_IN the_DT reception_NN of_IN in-door_JJ patients_NNS only_RB ,_, and_CC has_VBZ been_VBN in_IN existence_NN for_IN the_DT last_JJ six_CD years_NNS and_CC four_CD months_NNS ._.
Amount_NN of_IN accom-_JJ modation_NN avail-_JJ able_JJ ._.
2_CD ._.
It_PRP ordinarily_RB provides_VBZ 36_CD beds_NNS only_RB ,_, but_CC during_IN the_DT last_JJ year_NN ,_, from_IN July_NNP to_TO December_NNP ,_, when_WRB sickness_NN was_VBD unusually_RB prevalent_JJ ,_, extra_JJ accommodation_NN was_VBD provided_VBN for_IN patients_NNS brought_VBN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN with_IN serious_JJ and_CC urgent_JJ symptoms_NNS ,_, to_TO prevent_VB their_PRP$ dying_NN on_IN the_DT way_NN if_IN removed_VBN to_TO Calcutta_NNP hospitals_NNS ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN beds_NNS never_RB exceeded_VBD 45_CD at_IN a_DT time_NN ,_, for_IN fear_NN of_IN overcrowding_VBG ._.
Building_NN ._.
The_DT hospital_NN is_VBZ located_VBN in_IN a_DT house_NN ,_, situated_VBN on_IN the_DT Cossipore_NNP Road_NNP ,_, close_RB to_TO the_DT Government_NNP Gun_NNP Foundry_NNP ,_, for_IN which_WDT a_DT rent_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
60_CD is_VBZ paid_VBN per_IN month_NN ._.
The_DT patients_NNS are_VBP accommodated_VBN in_IN a_DT large_JJ commodious_JJ shed_VBN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ open_JJ on_IN the_DT south_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ supplied_VBN by_IN a_DT masonry_NN wall_NN ,_, having_VBG openings_NNS for_IN ventilation_NN on_IN the_DT other_JJ sides_NNS ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ canvas_VBN purdahs_NNS on_IN the_DT south_NN which_WDT protects_VBZ it_PRP from_IN the_DT sun_NN and_CC rain_NN ._.
The_DT roof_NN is_VBZ thatched_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT floor_NN is_VBZ nearly_RB on_IN a_DT level_NN with_IN premises_NNS ._.
The_DT shed_JJ being_VBG unsuitable_JJ for_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN a_DT hospital_NN ,_, the_DT committee_NN of_IN management_NN are_VBP endeavoring_VBG their_PRP$ utmost_NN to_TO build_VB a_DT suitable_JJ house_NN ._.
A_DT site_NN for_IN the_DT building_NN has_VBZ been_VBN obtained_VBN at_IN Borana-_NNP gore_NN as_IN a_DT free_JJ gift_NN from_IN Babu_NNP Chunder_NNP Coomar_NNP Roy_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ co-sharers_NNS of_IN the_DT Narail_NNP estate_NN ._.
I_PRP believe_VBP the_DT erection_NN of_IN the_DT building_NN will_MD soon_RB commence_VB ._.
There_EX is_VBZ a_DT one-storied_JJ house_NN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN compound_NN ,_, which_WDT not_RB being_VBG adapted_VBN for_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN a_DT hospital_NN ,_, is_VBZ occupied_VBN by_IN the_DT Sub-Assistant_JJ Surgeon_NNP ,_, his_PRP$ office_NN and_CC dispensary_NN ._.
Finances_NNS ._.
The_DT finances_NNS of_IN the_DT hospital_NN are_VBP managed_VBN by_IN a_DT committee_NN of_IN influential_JJ Native_NNP and_CC European_JJ gentlemen_NNS ,_, the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT 24-Pergunnahs_JJ being_VBG the_DT ex-officio_JJ president_NN ._.
The_DT Government_NNP contributes_VBZ the_DT pay_NN of_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN and_CC the_DT cost_NN of_IN Europe_NNP medicines_NNS and_CC surgical_JJ instruments_NNS ._.
On_IN the_DT recommendation_NN of_IN the_DT Deputy-Inspector_NNP General_NNP of_IN Hospitals_NNP ,_, a_DT more_RBR liberal_JJ diet_JJ scale_NN was_VBD adopted_VBN in_IN September_NNP last_JJ ._.
This_DT has_VBZ consider-_NN ably_RB increased_VBD the_DT expenditure_NN ._.
The_DT increased_JJ expenditure_NN is_VBZ partially_RB met_VBN from_IN the_DT savings_NNS in_IN the_DT cost_NN of_IN the_DT sanctioned_JJ establishment_NN ._.
The_DT financial_JJ position_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN is_VBZ satisfactory_JJ ._.
The_DT balance_NN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN 1871_CD was_VBD Rs_NNP ._.
16,683-3-4_CD ,_, which_WDT ,_, added_VBD to_TO the_DT subscriptions_NNS ,_, donations_NNS realized_VBN ,_, and_CC interest_NN of_IN invested_JJ funds_NNS ,_, aggregate_NN Rs_NNP ._.
24,182-11-1_JJ ._.
The_DT total_JJ expenditure_NN was_VBD Rs_NNP ._.
4,554-9-3_CD ._.
The_DT balance_NN available_JJ on_IN the_DT 1st_CD January_NNP 1873_CD was_VBD Rs_NNP ._.
19,628-1-10_JJ :_: of_IN this_DT sum_NN Rs_NNP ._.
17,882-1-6_JJ is_VBZ invested_VBN in_IN municipal_JJ debentures_NNS ._.
The_DT pay_NN of_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN and_CC the_DT cost_NN of_IN Europe_NNP medicines_NNS received_VBD as_IN contributions_NNS from_IN the_DT Government_NNP are_VBP shown_VBN in_IN the_DT accompanying_VBG returns_NNS ,_, but_CC not_RB included_VBN in_IN the_DT totals_NNS given_VBN above_RB ._.
Number_NNP of_IN patients_NNS treated_VBN ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN sick_JJ treated_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN was_VBD 726_CD against_IN 749_CD of_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
Of_IN this_DT number_NN 317_CD were_VBD discharged_VBN cured_VBN ,_, 99_CD had_VBD partial_JJ relief_NN ,_, 34_CD were_VBD no_DT better_JJR ,_, 191_CD died_VBD ,_, and_CC 35_CD remained_VBN under_IN treatment_NN on_IN the_DT 1st_CD of_IN January_NNP 1873_CD ._.
The_DT daily_JJ average_JJ number_NN of_IN sick_JJ treated_VBN was_VBD 35.178_CD against_IN 36_CD of_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
Mortality_NN ._.
The_DT percentage_NN of_IN mortality_NN among_IN the_DT sick_JJ treated_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN was_VBD 26_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
against_IN 24_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
This_DT high_JJ death-rate_NN was_VBD owing_VBG to_TO the_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN low_JJ cases_NNS of_IN diarrhNORTH_JJ SUBURBAN_NNP HOSPITAL_NNP ._.
113_CD and_CC dysentery_NN admitted_VBN into_IN the_DT hospital_NN in_IN an_DT advanced_JJ state_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP had_VBD been_VBN generally_RB so_RB ill-fed_JJ and_CC emaciated_VBD that_IN they_PRP might_MD be_VB said_VBD to_TO have_VB passed_VBN all_DT human_JJ remedy_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT North_NNP Suburban_NNP Hospital_NNP being_VBG a_DT pauper_NN hospital_NN ,_, I_PRP had_VBD no_DT option_NN but_CC to_TO admit_VB them_PRP ._.
Leaving_VBG out_IN of_IN calculation_NN the_DT moribund_NN cases_NNS which_WDT were_VBD 40_CD in_IN number_NN ,_, and_CC which_WDT proved_VBD fatal_JJ within_IN 48_CD hours_NNS after_IN admission_NN into_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, the_DT mortality_NN was_VBD 20_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
The_DT deaths_NNS from_IN cholera_NN have_VBP not_RB been_VBN included_VBN among_IN these_DT moribund_NN cases_NNS ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN capital_NN operations_NNS performed_VBD was_VBD nine_CD ._.
All_DT of_IN these_DT made_VBN good_JJ recoveries_NNS ._.
This_DT speaks_VBZ well_RB of_IN the_DT cleanliness_NN enjoined_VBD at_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
Operations_NNS ._.
The_DT last_JJ year_NN was_VBD unusually_RB unhealthy_JJ ._.
Dengue_NNP made_VBD its_PRP$ appearance_NN in_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
A_DT few_JJ cases_NNS of_IN it_PRP only_RB were_VBD observed_VBN at_IN first_JJ ,_, in_IN December_NNP 1871_CD ;_: but_CC during_IN the_DT months_NNS of_IN April_NNP ,_, May_NNP ,_, and_CC June_NNP ,_, it_PRP raged_VBD as_IN an_DT epidemic_NN ,_, after_IN which_WDT period_NN it_PRP gradually_RB disappeared_VBD ,_, leaving_VBG no_DT trace_NN what-_JJ ever_RB of_IN its_PRP$ existence_NN by_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN September_NNP ._.
The_DT hospital_NN establish-_JJ ment_NN along_IN with_IN the_DT residents_NNS suffered_VBD from_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
As_IN cases_NNS of_IN dengue_NN recovered_VBN without_IN medical_JJ aid_NN ,_, or_CC medicines_NNS ,_, very_RB few_JJ persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN that_DT disease_NN resorted_VBD to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ._.
Dengue_NNP ._.
Along_IN with_IN dengue_NN ,_, a_DT type_NN of_IN low_JJ remittent_NN fever_NN also_RB prevailed_VBD in_IN this_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT suburbs_NN ._.
The_DT cases_NNS of_IN remittent_NN fever_NN were_VBD very_RB common_JJ from_IN June_NNP to_TO December_NNP ._.
The_DT disease_NN was_VBD marked_VBN by_IN early_JJ prostration_NN ,_, and_CC delirium114_JJ REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP CALCUTTA_NNP MEDICAL_NNP INSTITUTIONS_NNP ._.

REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP SUMBHOO_NNP NAUTH_NNP PUNDIT_NNP HOSPITAL_NNP ._.
Bhowanipore_NNP ,_, otherwise_RB called_VBD the_DT Sumbhoo_NNP Nauth_NNP Pundit_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, after_IN ,_, a_DT High_JJ Court_NNP Native_NNP Judge_NNP ,_, now_RB deceased_VBN ,_, was_VBD originally_RB a_DT Government_NNP insti-_JJ tution_NN ,_, and_CC all_DT expenses_NNS incurred_VBN on_IN its_PRP$ account_NN were_VBD met_VBN from_IN the_DT Govern-_NNP ment_JJ treasury_NN ._.
It_PRP received_VBD the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT Sumbhoo_NNP Nauth_NNP Pundit_NNP Hospital_NNP in_IN 1871_CD ,_, which_WDT was_VBD given_VBN to_TO it_PRP in_IN the_DT hope_NN that_IN the_DT executors_NNS of_IN the_DT will_MD of_IN the_DT late_JJ distinguished_VBN Judge_NNP would_MD endow_VB it_PRP ._.
This_DT hope_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, was_VBD disappointed_VBN ._.
In_IN the_DT same_JJ year_NN ,_, 1871_CD ,_, about_RB eleven_RB thousand_VB rupees_NNS were_VBD collected_VBN by_IN private_JJ subscriptions_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT portion_NN of_IN this_DT has_VBZ been_VBN invested_VBN in_IN Government_NNP paper_NN ,_, yielding_VBG an_DT income_NN of_IN a_DT sum_JJ total_NN of_IN 45_CD rupees_NNS a_DT month_NN ._.
A_DT number_NN of_IN gentlemen_NNS promised_VBN to_TO subscribe_VB monthly_RB as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT hospital_NN had_VBD received_VBN its_PRP$ new_JJ name_NN ;_: but_CC these_DT subscriptions_NNS ,_, for_IN some_DT reason_NN unexplained_JJ ,_, have_VBP not_RB yet_RB been_VBN collected_VBN ._.
On_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN getting_VBG public_JJ aid_NN to_TO the_DT institution_NN ,_, the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP writes_NNS ;_: (_( see_VB letter_NN No_NNP ._.
3833_CD ,_, from_IN Officiating_VBG Under-_NNP Secretary_NNP ,_, dated_VBD 28th_CD August_NNP 1872_CD )_) ._.
``_`` His_PRP$ Honor_NNP thinks_VBZ that_IN as_IN the_DT value_NN of_IN the_DT dispensary_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT benefit_NN it_PRP confers_VBZ ,_, should_MD after_IN the_DT lapse_NN of_IN so_RB many_JJ years_NNS be_VB well_RB and_CC widely_RB known_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ time_NN local_JJ officers_NNS ,_, the_DT committee_NN ,_, and_CC those_DT who_WP take_VBP an_DT interest_NN in_IN the_DT success_NN and_CC continuance_NN of_IN the_DT institution_NN ,_, should_MD make_VB a_DT vigorous_JJ effort_NN to_TO raise_VB subscriptions_NNS and_CC make_VB it_PRP more_RBR self-_JJ supporting_NN ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: At_IN any_DT rate_NN His_PRP$ Honor_NNP has_VBZ decided_VBN that_IN the_DT continu-_JJ ance_NN of_IN the_DT money_NN grant_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
100_CD a_DT month_NN shall_MD depend_VB on_IN whether_IN a_DT proper_JJ subscription_NN is_VBZ raised_VBN to_TO show_VB that_IN the_DT institution_NN is_VBZ really_RB required_JJ and_CC appreciated_JJ ._. ''_''
At_IN present_JJ the_DT financial_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT hospita_NN lis_NN being_VBG thoroughly_JJ reviewed_VBN ;_: and_CC I_PRP believe_VBP that_RB ,_, as_IN recommended_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP ,_, a_DT vigorous_JJ effort_NN will_MD soon_RB be_VB made_VBN to_TO raise_VB subscriptions_NNS ._.
The_DT present_JJ income_NN and_CC resources_NNS are_VBP derived_VBN as_IN follows_VBZ :_: SUMBHOO_NNP NAUTH_NNP PUNDIT_NNP HOSPITAL_NNP ._.

Typhoid_NNP fever_NN ._.
community_NN ._.

Dengue_NNP ._.

The_DT ratios_NNS in_IN 1871_CD were_VBD as_IN follow_JJ :_: CALCUTTA_NN LOCK_NNP HOSPITALS_NNP ._.
161_CD a_DT chronic_JJ condition_NN ,_, it_PRP becomes_VBZ very_RB difficult_JJ indeed_RB ,_, if_IN not_RB impossible_JJ ,_, to_TO detect_VB the_DT exact_JJ nature_NN of_IN such_JJ cases_NNS ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, whether_IN they_PRP are_VBP contagious_JJ or_CC not_RB ._.
Under_IN these_DT circumstances_NNS it_PRP seemed_VBD to_TO me_PRP advisable_JJ to_TO detain_VB every_DT doubtful_JJ case_NN of_IN this_DT description_NN ,_, and_CC being_VBG supported_VBN in_IN this_DT opinion_NN by_IN the_DT Commis-_NNP sioner_NN of_IN Police_NNP ,_, I_PRP issued_VBD orders_NNS to_TO this_DT effect_NN to_TO the_DT different_JJ medical_JJ officers_NNS in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT examining_NN wards_NNS ,_, shortly_RB after_IN I_PRP had_VBD assumed_VBN charge_NN of_IN my_PRP$ office_NN ._.
The_DT measure_NN naturally_RB increased_VBD the_DT numbers_NNS in_IN hospitals_NNS ,_, and_CC hence_RB the_DT somewhat_RB higher_JJR ratio_NN in_IN 1872_CD over_IN 1871_CD ._.
The_DT unregistered_JJ women_NNS who_WP resort_VBP to_TO the_DT lock_NN hospitals_NNS are_VBP those_DT who_WP are_VBP compelled_VBN by_IN the_DT severity_NN of_IN disease_NN to_TO seek_VB relief_NN ._.

And_CC here_RB I_PRP beg_VBP permission_NN to_TO point_VB out_RP a_DT common_JJ error_NN in_IN connection_NN with_IN the_DT working_NN of_IN Act_NNP XIV_NNP ._.
of_IN 1868_CD ,_, which_WDT seems_VBZ to_TO prevail_VB pretty_RB generally_RB ._.
There_EX is_VBZ an_DT idea_NN that_WDT among_IN other_JJ good_JJ effects_NNS ,_, which_WDT must_MD necessarily_RB follow_VB the_DT introduction_NN of_IN the_DT Act_NNP ,_, ought_MD to_TO be_VB a_DT complete_JJ eradica-_JJ tion_NN of_IN all_DT kinds_NNS of_IN venereal_NN diseases_NNS in_IN Calcutta_NNP ._.
But_CC those_DT who_WP anticipate_VBP such_JJ results_NNS forget_VBP that_IN while_IN the_DT women_NNS are_VBP subjected_VBN to_TO supervision_NN and_CC periodical_JJ examinations_NNS ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO protect_VB the_DT male_JJ population_NN from_IN contamina-_JJ tion_NN ,_, no_DT protection_NN whatever_WDT is_VBZ afforded_VBN them_PRP against_IN their_PRP$ being_VBG infected_VBN by_IN the_DT opposite_JJ sex_NN ._.
There_EX are_VBP hundreds_NNS of_IN men_NNS who_WP arrive_VBP in_IN Calcutta_NNP daily_RB from_IN various_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX is_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN that_IN a_DT large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN them_PRP import_NN and_CC spread_JJ disease_NN ;_: the_DT worst_JJS among_IN them_PRP being_VBG the_DT sailors_NNS ._.
As_RB long_RB as_IN such_JJ source_NN of_IN infection_NN continues_VBZ to_TO exist_VB ,_, it_PRP would_MD be_VB unreasonable_JJ to_TO expect_VB a_DT complete_JJ disappearance_NN of_IN these_DT diseases_NNS ._.

The_DT table_NN given_VBN in_IN paragraph_NN 5_CD ,_, comparing_VBG as_IN it_PRP does_VBZ not_RB only_RB the_DT hospital_NN rates_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT municipal_JJ returns_NNS of_IN mortality_NN ,_, shows_VBZ a_DT great_JJ improvement_NN in_IN the_DT public_JJ health_NN during_IN the_DT last_JJ five_CD years_NNS ._.
In_IN 1867_CD the_DT hospital_NN rate_NN was_VBD 191_CD ,_, or_CC ,_, excluding_VBG cholera_NN ,_, 175_CD ._.
In_IN 1868_CD it_PRP rose_VBD to_TO 199_CD ,_, or_CC ,_, excluding_VBG cholera_NN ,_, 179_CD ,_, but_CC since_IN then_RB it_PRP has_VBZ steadily_RB fallen_VBN to_TO 132_CD ,_, as_IN stated_VBN above_IN ._.
At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN it_PRP must_MD be_VB observed_VBN that_IN in_IN comparing_VBG the_DT different_JJ hospitals_NNS an_DT element_NN of_IN uncertainty_NN is_VBZ introduced_VBN into_IN these_DT returns_NNS owing_VBG to_TO the_DT practice_NN of_IN rejecting_VBG cases_NNS believed_VBN to_TO be_VB hopeless_VBN at_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT principal_JJ hospitals_NNS ,_, and_CC sending_VBG them_PRP to_TO the_DT Pauper_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
Dr._NNP Macnamara_NNP states_VBZ that_IN the_DT growth_NN of_IN this_DT practice_NN is_VBZ one_CD cause_NN for_IN the_DT diminution_NN of_IN the_DT mortality_NN in_IN the_DT Native_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP has_VBZ called_VBN for_IN a_DT special_JJ report_NN on_IN this_DT subject_NN ._.
The_DT municipal_JJ registration_NN figures_NNS given_VBN in_IN the_DT return_NN show_NN that_IN the_DT death-rates_NNS of_IN the_DT last_JJ three_CD years_NNS for_IN the_DT town_NN generally_RB are_VBP lower_JJR than_IN those_DT of_IN the_DT three_CD preceding_NN by_IN a_DT very_RB marked_JJ difference_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT rate_NN which_WDT was_VBD 22.6_CD in_IN 1870_CD was_VBD 23.1_CD in_IN 1871_CD ,_, and_CC 26.4_CD in_IN 1872_CD (_( not_RB much_RB under_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN 1867_CD ,_, viz._NN ,_, 27.1_CD )_) ._.
The_DT rise_NN in_IN the_DT rate_NN is_VBZ apparently_RB to_TO be_VB ascribed_VBN chiefly_NN to_TO cholera_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
Setting_VBG aside_RP the_DT extraordinary_JJ epidemic_NN of_IN dengue_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, however_RB ,_, among_IN 2,292_CD persons_NNS treated_VBN ,_, caused_VBD only_RB seven_CD deaths_NNS ,_, the_DT table_NN of_IN diseases_NNS shows_NNS that_IN the_DT prevalent_JJ types_NNS of_IN maladies_NNS were_VBD the_DT same_JJ as_IN in_IN former_JJ years_NNS ._.
Of_IN 2,761_CD deaths_NNS ,_, 306_CD were_VBD from_IN fever_NN ,_, 217_CD from_IN cholera_NN ,_, 301_CD from_IN phthisis_NN ,_, 217_CD from_IN dropsy_NN ,_, 682_CD from_IN dysentery_NN and_CC diarrh_NN (_( 3_CD )_) is_VBZ ordinarily_RB much_RB higher_JJR than_IN among_IN Europeans_NNPS and_CC Eurasians_NNPS ,_, but_CC ,_, strangely_RB enough_JJ ,_, during_IN 1872_CD cholera_NN ,_, diarrh_NN (_( 4_CD )_) already_RB contributed_VBN to_TO the_DT municipal_JJ funds_NNS a_DT large_JJ sum_NN of_IN money_NN for_IN effecting_VBG a_DT thorough_JJ drainage_NN of_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT College_NNP Council_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN asked_VBN to_TO aid_VB His_PRP$ Honor_NNP with_IN suggestions_NNS for_IN improving_VBG the_DT present_JJ college_NN and_CC hospital_JJ buildings_NNS ._.
13_CD ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP is_VBZ glad_JJ to_TO observe_VB that_IN the_DT legacy_NN ,_, moneys_NNS ,_, and_CC other_JJ funds_NNS belonging_VBG to_TO the_DT hospital_NN have_VBP been_VBN brought_VBN under_IN proper_NN control_NN ._.
As_IN suggested_VBN ,_, all_PDT the_DT floating_VBG deposits_NNS and_CC accumulated_JJ interest_NN may_MD be_VB at_IN once_RB invested_VBN in_IN Government_NNP paper_NN ._.
14_CD ._.
The_DT experiment_NN of_IN training_VBG native_JJ midwives_NNS should_MD certainly_RB not_RB be_VB given_VBN up_RP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ satisfactory_JJ to_TO see_VB that_DT three_CD out_IN of_IN the_DT four_CD under_IN tuition_NN have_VBP passed_VBN the_DT examinations_NNS ._.
15_CD ._.
General_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) excluding_VBG absolute_JJ moribunds_NNS ._.
Of_IN the_DT 1,518_CD deaths_NNS among_IN the_DT 5,467_CD persons_NNS under_IN treatment_NN ,_, 303_CD died_VBD within_IN twenty-four_JJ hours_NNS ,_, and_CC 494_CD more_JJR within_IN a_DT week_NN of_IN admission_NN ._.
Most_JJS of_IN the_DT cases_NNS when_WRB they_PRP come_VBP in_IN are_VBP chronic_JJ and_CC beyond_IN all_DT medical_JJ skill_NN ._.
Half_PDT the_DT admissions_NNS are_VBP cases_NNS rejected_VBN by_IN the_DT other_JJ hospitals_NNS and_CC then_RB brought_VBD to_TO the_DT Pauper_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN the_DT remainder_NN are_VBP picked_VBN up_RP by_IN the_DT police_NN in_IN the_DT streets_NNS ._.
Everything_NN has_VBZ been_VBN done_VBN that_WDT can_MD be_VB reasonably_RB expected_VBN to_TO reduce_VB the_DT death-rate_NN and_CC increase_VB the_DT chances_NNS of_IN these_DT poor_JJ creatures_NNS ,_, but_CC without_IN much_JJ perceptible_JJ effect_NN ._.
The_DT attention_NN of_IN the_DT Justices_NNPS will_MD be_VB invited_VBN ,_, through_IN their_PRP$ Chairman_NNP ,_, to_TO Dr._NNP Woodford_NNP 's_POS represent-_JJ ations_NNS as_IN to_TO the_DT necessity_NN of_IN enclosing_VBG the_DT building_NN and_CC grounds_NNS of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP also_RB ,_, as_IN intimated_VBN in_IN paragraph_NN 4_CD above_IN ,_, wishes_NNS to_TO have_VB full_JJ and_CC exact_JJ report_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT present_JJ practice_NN of_IN the_DT other_JJ large_JJ hospitals_NNS in_IN rejecting_VBG cases_NNS or_CC sending_VBG them_PRP to_TO the_DT Pauper_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ agrees_NNS with_IN the_DT Surgeon-General_JJ that_IN the_DT present_JJ designation_NN of_IN Resident_NNP Apothecary_NNP is_VBZ more_RBR appropriate_JJ than_IN the_DT proposed_VBN one_CD of_IN House-Surgeon_NNP for_IN the_DT apothecaries_NNS attached_VBN to_TO the_DT Pauper_NNP and_CC Police_NNP Hospitals_NNP ._.
23_CD ._.
The_DT Police_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
(_( 6_CD )_) hospital_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB very_RB high_JJ as_IN compared_VBN with_IN others_NNS ._.
From_IN the_DT report_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ gathered_VBN that_IN the_DT rate_NN among_IN Europeans_NNPS was_VBD last_JJ year_NN only_RB 46.90_CD per_IN mille_NN ,_, or_CC very_RB little_JJ over_IN the_DT General_NNP Hospital_NNP rate_NN ._.
Among_IN the_DT natives_NNS ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, the_DT mortality_NN was_VBD very_RB high_JJ ,_, 263_CD among_IN 700_CD patients_NNS ._.
Of_IN these_DT ,_, 149_CD were_VBD moribund_VBN when_WRB admitted_VBN ;_: but_CC even_RB the_DT death-rate_NN among_IN patients_NNS not_RB of_IN this_DT class_NN was_VBD 194.52_CD per_IN mille_NN ._.
The_DT cause_NN of_IN this_DT is_VBZ probably_RB the_DT fact_NN that_IN Howrah_NNP is_VBZ the_DT terminus_NN of_IN a_DT great_JJ railway_NN line_NN ,_, and_CC surrounded_VBN by_IN factories_NNS of_IN various_JJ kinds_NNS (_( 7_CD )_) No_DT ._.

FROM_NNP J._NNP CAMPBELL_NNP BROWN_NNP ,_, ESQ._NNP ,_, C.B._NNP ,_, Surgeon-General_NNP ,_, Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Department_NNP ,_, To_TO THE_NNP SECRETARY_NNP TO_NNP THE_NNP GOVERNMENT_NNP OF_NNP BENGAL_NNP ._.
Dated_VBN Fort_NNP William_NNP ,_, the_DT 27th_CD May_NNP 1874_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, Medical_NNP College_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, General_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, Calcutta_NNP Nurses_NNP '_POS Institution_NNP ,_, Municipal_NNP Pauper_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, Municipal_NNP Police_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, Sukea_NNP 's_POS Street_NNP Dispensary_NNP ,_, North_NNP Suburban_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, Sumbhoo_NNP Nath_NNP Pundit_NNP 's_POS Hospital_NNP ,_, Alipore_NNP Dispensary_NNP ,_, Aratoon_NNP Apcar_NNP Dispensary_NNP ,_, Howrah_NNP General_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, Calcutta_NNP Lock_NNP Hospitals_NNP ._.
I_PRP HAVE_VBP the_DT honor_NN to_TO submit_VB the_DT returns_NNS and_CC reports_NNS of_IN the_DT medical_JJ institutions_NNS marginally_RB enumerated_VBN for_IN the_DT calendar_NN year_NN 1873_CD ._.
The_DT superintendent_NN has_VBZ again_RB been_VBN good_JJ enough_RB to_TO furnish_VB me_PRP with_IN the_DT returns_NNS of_IN the_DT (_( Mayo_NNP )_) Native_NNP Hospital_NNP and_CC its_PRP$ affiliated_JJ dispensaries_NNS ._.
This_DT report_NN ,_, therefore_RB ,_, contains_VBZ the_DT statistics_NNS of_IN all_PDT the_DT public_JJ medical_JJ charities_NNS in_IN Calcutta_NNP and_CC its_PRP$ suburbs_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP am_VBP enabled_VBN to_TO present_VB in_IN a_DT complete_JJ manner_NN the_DT combined_JJ results_NNS of_IN the_DT working_NN of_IN all_PDT these_DT institutions_NNS ,_, both_CC as_IN showing_VBG the_DT extent_NN of_IN relief_NN afforded_VBN to_TO the_DT sick_JJ poor_JJ ,_, and_CC also_RB as_IN indicating_NN ,_, with_IN some_DT degree_NN of_IN approximation_NN ,_, the_DT general_JJ health_NN of_IN the_DT community_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
Attendance_NN and_CC death-rates_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
Attendance.3_NNP CALCUTTA_NNP MEDICAL_NNP INSTITUTIONS_NNP ._.
hospitals_NNS and_CC dispensaries_NNS ,_, decrease_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB observed_VBN in_IN the_DT North_NNP Suburban_NNP and_CC Sumbhoo_NNP Nath_NNP Pundit_NNP 's_POS Hospitals_NNS and_CC the_DT Alipore_NNP Dispensary_NNP ._.
The_DT marked_JJ exception_NN is_VBZ the_DT Howrah_NNP General_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, which_WDT alone_RB presents_VBZ a_DT decided_JJ increase_NN of_IN in-door_JJ attendance_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
As_IN regards_NNS out-door_JJ patients_NNS ,_, the_DT decrease_NN is_VBZ entirely_RB due_JJ to_TO a_DT large_JJ falling_VBG off_RP in_IN the_DT numbers_NNS attending_VBG the_DT Mayo_NNP Hospital_NNP and_CC its_PRP$ dispensaries_NNS ,_, which_WDT the_DT superintendent_NN believes_VBZ to_TO be_VB explained_VBN by_IN the_DT epidemic_NN of_IN dengue_NN in_IN 1872_CD ._.
He_PRP states_VBZ ,_, in_IN a_DT communication_NN received_VBN from_IN him_PRP ,_, that_IN though_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN new_JJ cases_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN smaller_JJR ,_, ``_`` the_DT total_JJ attendance_NN ''_'' has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN less_RBR this_DT last_JJ year_NN than_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT dengue_NN epidemic_JJ ,_, patients_NNS came_VBD once_RB and_CC then_RB did_VBD not_RB return_VB ._.
All_PDT the_DT other_JJ institutions_NNS show_VBP an_DT increased_JJ attendance_NN of_IN out-patients_NNS ._.
3_CD ._.

Water-supply_NNP ._.
The_DT only_JJ work_NN of_IN any_DT magnitude_NN executed_VBN during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN under_IN this_DT head_NN was_VBD the_DT fitting_NN in_IN of_IN additional_JJ tanks_NNS and_CC pipes_NNS for_IN a_DT more_RBR liberal_JJ supply_NN of_IN water_NN to_TO the_DT latrines_NNS and_CC lavatories_NNS ._.
These_DT arrangements_NNS have_VBP not_RB as_IN yet_RB met_VBN the_DT object_NN intended_VBN ._.
The_DT executive_NN engineer_NN ,_, 1st_CD Calcutta_NNP division_NN ,_, writing_VBG on_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN the_DT failure_NN of_IN the_DT new_JJ system_NN ,_, says_VBZ ``_`` there_EX would_MD have_VB been_VBN no_DT deficiency_NN of_IN water_NN in_IN any_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT building_NN had_VBD the_DT pressure_NN from_IN the_DT main_JJ supply_NN been_VBN maintained_VBN sufficiently_RB high_JJ to_TO feed_VB the_DT new_JJ system_NN laid_VBN into_IN the_DT building_NN ._. ''_''
The_DT water-supply_NN has_VBZ therefore_RB been_VBN maintained_VBN as_IN heretofore_NN by_IN means_NNS of_IN the_DT hospital_NN steam_NN pump_NN at_IN a_DT considerable_JJ outlay_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN in_IN a_DT short_JJ time_NN the_DT pressure_NN in_IN the_DT main_JJ will_MD be_VB made_VBN sufficient_JJ to_TO raise_VB water_NN to_TO the_DT needful_JJ height_NN of_IN 50_CD feet_NNS ._.

MIDWIFERY_NNP ._.
There_EX have_VBP been_VBN twenty-four_JJ deliveries_NNS ,_, and_CC one_CD of_IN these_DT remains_NNS over_IN to_TO be_VB accounted_VBN for_IN in_IN the_DT return_NN of_IN 1874_CD ._.
There_EX have_VBP been_VBN two_CD cases_NNS of_IN genuine_JJ puerperal_JJ fever_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD of_IN phlegmosia_NN dolens46_JJ REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP CALCUTTA_NNP MEDICAL_NNP INSTITUTIONS_NNP ._.
minute_JJ inspection_NN from_IN day_NN to_TO day_NN that_IN progress_NN towards_NNS recovery_NN or_CC otherwise_NN can_MD be_VB ascer-_JJ tained_VBN with_IN certainty_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ the_DT absence_NN of_IN this_DT means_NN of_IN diagnosis_NN and_CC prognosis_NN which_WDT constitutes_VBZ the_DT greatest_JJS objection_NN to_TO the_DT water-closet_JJ system_NN for_IN hospitals_NNS in_IN tropical_JJ climates_NNS ._.
This_DT observation_NN is_VBZ specially_RB applicable_JJ to_TO the_DT earlier_JJR stages_NNS of_IN dysenteric_JJ disease_NN ,_, when_WRB ,_, by_IN the_DT operation_NN of_IN the_DT water-closet_JJ plan_NN of_IN getting_VBG rid_JJ of_IN the_DT night-soil_NN ,_, the_DT products_NNS of_IN morbid_JJ action_NN might_MD ,_, and_CC frequently_RB would_MD ,_, be_VB entirely_RB cast_VBN away_RB and_CC lost_VBD sight_NN of_IN ,_, at_IN a_DT period_NN ,_, too_RB ,_, when_WRB the_DT most_RBS accurate_JJ examination_NN of_IN the_DT dejecta_NN is_VBZ all-important_JJ from_IN a_DT diagnostic_JJ and_CC prognostic_JJ point_NN of_IN view_NN ._.
Water-supply_JJ I_PRP am_VBP looking_VBG forward_NN to_TO the_DT introduction_NN of_IN the_DT new_JJ water-supply_NN from_IN the_DT municipal_JJ water-works_NNS at_IN an_DT early_JJ date_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD understood_RB ,_, when_WRB the_DT filtered_JJ water_NN was_VBD first_RB proposed_VBN for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT extension_NN of_IN the_DT water_NN system_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN was_VBD to_TO comprise_VB an_DT adequate_JJ allowance_NN to_TO the_DT sick_JJ treated_VBN in_IN the_DT General_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
Unfortunately_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, just_RB when_WRB the_DT government_NN of_IN Sir_NNP George_NNP Campbell_NNP was_VBD on_IN the_DT eve_NN of_IN entertaining_VBG my_PRP$ proposal_NN to_TO this_DT effect_NN ,_, the_DT corporation_NN discovered_VBD that_IN there_EX was_VBD an_DT insufficient_JJ supply_NN for_IN the_DT wants_VBZ of_IN the_DT city_NN ._.
But_CC as_IN the_DT Chandpal_NNP scheme_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ to_TO provide_VB for_IN the_DT watering_NN of_IN the_DT streets_NNS and_CC to_TO liberate_VB a_DT proportionate_NN quantity_NN to_TO be_VB sold_VBN at_IN a_DT large_JJ profit_NN to_TO the_DT public_JJ institutions_NNS in_IN the_DT suburbs_NN ,_, is_VBZ now_RB nearly_RB completed_VBN ,_, I_PRP hope_VBP no_DT time_NN will_MD be_VB lost_VBN in_IN making_VBG the_DT necessary_JJ arrangements_NNS for_IN ,_, the_DT extension_NN of_IN the_DT municipal_JJ water_NN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ._.
Presidency_NNP jail_NN garden_NN ._.
The_DT Presidency_NNP jail_NN garden_NN has_VBZ been_VBN generally_RB kept_VBN so_RB clean_JJ that_IN little_JJ nuisance_NN has_VBZ resulted_VBN ;_: but_CC I_PRP have_VBP sometimes_RB noticed_VBN a_DT very_RB disagreeable_JJ smell_NN from_IN the_DT garden_NN ,_, proceed-_JJ ing_NN not_RB so_RB much_JJ from_IN unutilized_JJ and_CC undeodorized_JJ or_CC undisinfected_JJ night-soil_JJ manure_NN ,_, as_IN from_IN cabbage_NN leaves_NNS and_CC other_JJ vegetable_JJ products_NNS in_IN a_DT state_NN of_IN decay_NN and_CC decomposition_NN ._.
I_PRP think_VBP with_IN careful_JJ supervision_NN this_DT nuisance_NN might_MD be_VB altogether_RB prevented_VBN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP mentioned_VBN the_DT subject_NN to_TO Dr._NNP Mackenzie_NNP ,_, the_DT superintendent_NN of_IN the_DT jail_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP have_VBP no_DT doubt_NN but_CC that_IN he_PRP will_MD do_VB his_PRP$ utmost_NN to_TO remove_VB this_DT source_NN of_IN impurity_NN and_CC ill-health_NN ._.
MEDICAL_NNP SUBORDINATES_NNP '_POS QUARTERS_NNS ._.
Medical_JJ subbordinates_NNS '_POS quarters_NNS ._.
Whenever_WRB smells_NNS proceed_VBP from_IN the_DT jail_NN garden_NN ,_, they_PRP are_VBP more_RBR immediately_RB felt_VBN by_IN the_DT subordinates_NNS of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, whose_WP$ quarters_NNS are_VBP in_IN the_DT immediate_JJ neighbourhood_NN ;_: but_CC there_EX is_VBZ a_DT standing_VBG insanitary_JJ arrangement_NN of_IN even_RB greater_JJR gravity_NN in_IN the_DT open_JJ drain_NN running_VBG to_TO the_DT north_NN of_IN the_DT buildings_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT medical_JJ subordinates_NNS dwell_VBP ._.
I_PRP think_VBP if_IN this_DT were_VBD converted_VBN into_IN a_DT pipe_NN drain_NN ,_, with_IN properly_RB trapped_VBN sinks_NNS ,_, and_CC connected_VBN with_IN the_DT adjacent_JJ sewer_NN ,_, the_DT measure_NN would_MD materially_RB conduce_VB to_TO the_DT salubrity_NN of_IN the_DT quarters_NNS in_IN question_NN ._.
My_PRP$ predecessor_NN ,_, Dr._NNP Brougham_NNP ,_, entertained_VBD the_DT opinion_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT I_PRP fully_RB concur_VBP ,_, that_IN much_JJ of_IN the_DT great_JJ unhealthiness_NN among_IN the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN these_DT quarters_NNS was_VBD attributable_JJ to_TO the_DT open_JJ drain_NN ._.

LIBRARY_NNP ._.
Library_NNP ._.
The_DT library_NN is_VBZ under_IN the_DT direct_JJ supervision_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ resident_NN surgeon_NN ,_, Dr._NNP Palmer_NNP ,_, who_WP is_VBZ aided_VBN ,_, as_IN regards_NNS the_DT mechanical_JJ work_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT distribution_NN of_IN books_NNS ,_, newspapers_NNS ,_, and_CC periodicals_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT re-collection_NN and_CC immediate_JJ care_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ ,_, by_IN Mr._NNP J._NNP Smith_NNP ,_, the_DT ward-master_NN ,_, attached_VBN to_TO his_PRP$ ward_NN ._.

The_DT library_NN has_VBZ now_RB been_VBN removed_VBN from_IN its_PRP$ old_JJ habitation_NN on_IN the_DT landing_NN of_IN the_DT central_JJ building_NN to_TO a_DT well_RB lighted_VBN and_CC airy_JJ room_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN floor_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ ._.

was_VBD inaugurated_VBN by_IN His_PRP$ Honor_NNP the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP ,_, attended_VBN by_IN the_DT committee_NN of_IN the_DT charity_NN and_CC the_DT medical_JJ staff_NN of_IN the_DT General_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT 12th_CD August_NNP 1873_CD ._.

``_`` The_DT matron_NN ,_, Mrs._NNP Hickey_NNP ,_, requires_VBZ special_JJ mention_NN ._.
